item.description:
Hi All,
I spoke with Bob Adelizzi, we can put together a trip to TRACON in a few weeks for a Monday night. Seats are limited at this time though. If there is more interest than seats, we can ask for two trips.

We did this a couple of years ago and it was awesome!
It's about an hour drive and we should be there around 6:30. I say we leave and have dinner first near TRACON. Can we leave at 4:30 or so?

Bob added, "We'll need their names. They have to be US citizens, and will need a photo ID for the security people."

Please respond and answer the questions. We may have to drive there and car pool. It's in Merrimac NH

This is an interesting look into how ATC works...
Get ready for this rare look inside a state of the art ATC facility. Learn how to fly safer.

Thank Bob for your help with this, again.

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Trip to TRACON
